events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle on the morning of March 30th, requesting to open a claim for damages sustained.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the customer's car in a collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to assist the customer through the claim process and provide updates.
The claim acknowledgment was sent to the customer confirming receipt and ensuring assistance will be provided promptly.
The agent requested all relevant documents, including police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates.
Customer submitted all necessary documents, including the police report and repair quotes, to proceed with claim evaluation.
The claims team started investigating the accident circumstances based on submitted evidence and statements.
The investigation was completed confirming the details of the accident and verifying coverage eligibility.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover the vehicle repairs and associated costs based on the assessment.
The customer provided positive feedback on the proposed settlement and requested proceeding with the approval process.
The claim was approved by the insurance management following all validations and customer agreement on terms.
Payment covering the repair costs was issued to the customerâ€™s designated bank account as per agreed settlement.
The claim was officially closed after confirming customer satisfaction and receipt of payment for damages.
All documentation and records related to the auto accident claim were archived for compliance and future reference.
